column1: Senegal advanced to the elimination round for the first time since 2002 after a 2-1 victory over Ecuador. Sarr earned a penalty kick when Hincapie collided with him
column2: and he confidently put it in the back of the net. Ecuador attempted to come back in the second half
column3: and Caicedo scored from a corner to tie the game. However
column4: only two and a half minutes later
column5: Senegal regained the lead when Idrissa Gueye's free-kick was deflected to Koulibaly
column6: who volleyed in the winning goal.
